nodes.name: IncreasingPriceCrowdsale

nodes.documentation:
The base rate function is overridden to revert, since this crowdsale doens't use it, and
all calls to it are a mistake.
nodes.name: rate

nodes.documentation: @return the initial rate of the crowdsale.
nodes.name: initialRate

nodes.documentation: @return the final rate of the crowdsale.
nodes.name: finalRate
getCurrentRate
_getTokenAmount
